statements: SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal;
SELECT document_title, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste_disposal;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT document_title FROM hazardous_waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM hazardous_waste_disposal;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE compliance_level = 'High' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, document_title FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date > '2021-01-01' AND compliance_level = 'Low';
SELECT document_title, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE compliance_level IN ('Medium', 'High') ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT record_id, document_title, compliance_level FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM hazardous_waste_disposal;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDocumentation;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type FROM HazardousWasteDocumentation WHERE waste_type = 'Chemical';
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_date FROM HazardousWasteDocumentation ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT waste_id, disposal_method FROM HazardousWasteDocumentation WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration' ORDER BY waste_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, disposal_date, disposal_location, disposal_method FROM HazardousWasteDocumentation;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status='Compliant';
SELECT waste_id, disposal_method, waste_type FROM HazardousWasteDocumentation WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT disposal_location, waste_type, disposal_method FROM HazardousWasteDocumentation ORDER BY disposal_location DESC;
SELECT regulatory_agency, compliance_status, disposal_date FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE regulatory_agency LIKE '%EPA%' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations;
SELECT generator_name, location, contact_person FROM waste_generator;
SELECT tracking_id, disposal_site, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_tracking;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT generator_name, contact_email FROM waste_generator WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT generator_name, location, contact_person FROM waste_generator WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY generator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_tracking WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration' AND disposal_cost > 500 ORDER BY disposal_cost ASC;
SELECT generator_name, location, disposal_cost FROM waste_generator INNER JOIN waste_disposal_tracking ON waste_generator.generator_id = waste_disposal_tracking.tracking_id;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations
SELECT document_name, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT site_name, location, contact_person FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT company_name, valid_until, issued_by FROM compliance_certificates ORDER BY valid_until ASC
SELECT waste_type, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE disposal_site_id = 3
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT waste_type, disposal_date, site_name FROM waste_disposal_records JOIN waste_disposal_sites ON waste_disposal_records.disposal_site_id = waste_disposal_sites.site_id;
SELECT certificate_id, company_name, valid_until FROM compliance_certificates WHERE issued_by = 'EPA';
SELECT * FROM compliance_certificates ORDER BY valid_until DESC, company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRegulations;
SELECT document_name, disposal_location, compliance_status FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRegulations WHERE disposal_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT id, facility_name, facility_location FROM WasteDisposalFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT manifest_number, disposal_date, compliance_status FROM WasteDisposalManifests WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalRecords WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRegulations ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, document_name;
SELECT facility_name, facility_location, capacity FROM WasteDisposalFacilities WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT manifest_number, disposal_date, compliance_status FROM WasteDisposalManifests WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.record_type, f.facility_name, r.compliance_status FROM WasteDisposalRecords r JOIN WasteDisposalFacilities f ON r.facility_id = f.id WHERE f.facility_type = 'Incinerator';
SELECT officer_name, officer_email, officer_phone FROM ComplianceOfficers WHERE certification_status = FALSE ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
